Topic.Title: Please read this before asking for help

Posts.EditableText:
If something's not working in your game and you don't know why, it will help us to help you if you [b:1hwzkx7z]attach your game file[/b:1hwzkx7z].

You can do this using the "Upload attachment" tab which appears under the Submit/Preview/Save Draft buttons when posting.
